entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono calli does not setup LMF #64073
  • Intrinsify methods of System.Numerics.Vector #64072
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration tests failing on netfx x86 #64071
  • AF: g_TblIndex[ixTbl].m_Token == type in System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdate tests #64070
  • Pass through diagnostic information for failed calls to IPC WriteDumpAsync #64069
    7.0.0
  • BasicThreading test seg fault in Build Linux x64 release NativeAOT #64060
  • KnownHeader values may change casing of received values #64053
  • ChannelReader.ReadAsync/ChannelWriter.WriteAsync don't return or throw when cancellation token is signaled #64051
    7.0.0
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #64049
  • ildasm has problems with non-ASCII characters #64045
  • Process.Modules does not list dynamically loaded assemblies on Linux #64042
  • Blazor WASM does not free memory - possibly a memory leak #64047
  • [API Proposal]: Make AddHttpClient() inject an ITypedHttpClientFactory into instantiated class #64034
  • API Proposal: IPNetwork to support CIDR notation #64033
  • API Proposal: Generic LINQ Numeric Operators #64031
  • How to detect or prevent HTTPS endpoint fallback to Http #64029
  • Auto-vectorization of pointer indirection expr. and explicit layout #64026
  • Reuse JsonSerializerOptions when used with JsonSerializerContext #64025

Closed

  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests is causing large core dumps on macOS #63761
  • UserSecrets should be optional by default #61418
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringSyntaxAttribute #62505
    7.0.0
  • Linker tests failing with no space left on device on Linux x64 #60927
    7.0.0
  • Vector<byte>.Count doesn't match the code behavior #64052
  • Inconsistent assembly version for System.Text.Json netstandard2.0 #64003
  • Source generated System.Text.Json serialization uses AOT-unfriendly reflection #63843
    7.0.0
  • ALPN processing on Linux can be improved #58299
    7.0.0
  • Consider using SortedList instead of Dictionary in HttpHeaders #62846
    Future
  • IgnoreNullValues does not work with non-nullable value types #30795
    7.0.0
  • System.Linq support Deconstruct for IGrouping #63919
  • ReadyToRun and Unicode class names #61104
    6.0.x
  • cryptography/security test failures on RHEL9/Fedora 36. #63624
    7.0.0
  • More extensible object and collection converters #36785
    7.0.0
  • `JsonNumberHandling.WriteAsString` doesn't work when serializing `JsonElement` #63735
  • internal sealed class EnumConverter<T>.Read() #63893
  • Another segfault in gc_heap::get_region_plan_gen_num for a frozen object #63906
    7.0.0
  • Segfault in gc_heap::get_region_plan_gen_num for a frozen object #63778
    7.0.0
  • VS2019 Remote debugging: Attach fails on linux-arm with .NET 5.0.2 (Error 0x80131c4f) #47848
    Future
  • PGO assert in Loop Hoisting #63982

PullRequests

Created

  • force extra warmup #64075
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • RegexNode cleanup #64074
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable some browser legs on the extra-platforms pipeline #64065
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Log message of unexpected exception in ThrowsAny #64064
    area-Meta
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName #64062
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add missing handle function enter/return macros #64061
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #64056
  • [release/6.0] Fix JsonObject constuctor #64055
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove spaces from GH labels used by FabricBot #64048
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Make ILLink validation steps in libs incrementally buildable #64041
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignoring leading dot when comparing cookie domains #64038
    area-System.Net
  • Make ApiCompat.proj incrementally buildable #64037
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Extract SuperPMI into a separate component #64035
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64032
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
  • adding centralized location to disable library tests #64024
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringSyntaxAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Read the System.GC.CpuGroup settings in runtimeconfig.json #64067
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #64059
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Performance: Fix Browser Wasm job not being found for dependent jobs #64058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add StringSyntax attribute to Regex.pattern field #64063
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Revert "Temporarily disable coredumps during library testing on macOS (#63742)" #64057
    area-Infrastructure
  • Preserve `OBJ`/`BLK` on the RHS of `ASG` #63268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add test coverage for frozen objects and GC interaction #64030
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Polish the PR build doc #64036
    documentation
  • Fix dependency in runtime-official.yml #64040
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Crossgen2 bug #61104 and add regression test #64027
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • Update XUnit to 2.4.2-pre.22 #63948
    area-Meta
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid threading of nodes in rationalization #64012
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • Remove Type.MakeGenericType dependency from source generation #64004
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Disable DirectoryLongerThanMaxLongPathWithExtendedSyntax_ThrowsException #64044
    area-System.IO
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for stepper boundary attribute #63991
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [debugger][wasm] Added support for non user code attribute #63876
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix issues with verify_regions, clear_batch_mark_array_bits. #63798
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix Crossgen2 bug #61104 and add regression test #63956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64023
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ProcessLinkerXmlBase to NativeAOT #63666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Arm64] Keep unrolling InitBlock and CopyBlock up to 128 bytes #63422
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before object_gennum #63970
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before get_region_plan_gen_num #63828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update StructMarshalling design now that DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute is approved #63765
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix up switch map for out-of-loop predecessor #64014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #63642
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure several helper intrinsics are correctly imported and handled #63972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    blocking, area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add pmi_path argument to superpmi.py script and use it in the superpmi-collect pipeline. #63983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Apply changes on wasm using sdb protocol. #63705
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Initial WASI support prototype #63890
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength #63992
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63739
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #63816
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63955
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63951
    area-System.Security
  • Remove usage of FEATURE_CORESYSTEM #63850
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add alignment to mapped field stream #63305
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on Linux and OSX #63945
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ComputeHash to remove hash allocations for digest authentication #64005
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-System.Reflection
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed (part 2) #63915
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Allow generating Dwarf version 5 #63988
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
